snippet.title: Sonic 3 McDonalds South America Mini-Game (Full Playthrough)
snippet.description:
This game is currently available to those in a number of South American countries. It will not load unless you are accessing it from a valid country, or via a VPN.

The game: https://sc28954.happymealdigital.com/?locale=pt-BR

This video shows all three levels with all four characters. It also locks up after the Tails playthrough and needed to be refreshed.
